userMenu: When we can't the job done with updates, Buddy-Bot is here to help. With it's connection to the information highway, this little robot will change itself to make it a functional member of your household. Whether it be a whisk or blowtorch attachment, Buddy-Bot will help all the way.

Like all Digital Imaginations products, they are all built in with a chip to connect them with any smart appliances to help communicate better, giving them a chance to rise up to the occassion when it's time to do so. Buddy-Bot can tell your oven to preheat when dinner is being prepared while they are taking care of the children in the other room.
